Message.Title: Today's opening move . . .
Message.Msg: 1. Opens UP, stays up for a while, then meanders all day. 2. Opens UP, plunges immediately, then keeps declining slowly. 3. Opens DOWN, stays weak all day. 4. Opens DOWN, bounces sharply, then keeps creeping up slowly. 5. Opens UP, goes even higher, then gives back all of its gains later. 6. Opens UP, keeps going up all day. These are just a few of possibilities I can think of. Can you think of other possibilities?

Topic.Title: What a shock - max pain is 260 and look at the price action after lunch

Message.Msg: You can't compare to the market cap, you have to look at money flow for the day vs. the money made on the expiring contracts out of the money in the both directions. Amazon has very low daily money flow vs. its mkt cap, making it an easy stock to hedge against a firm's option position (or manipulate). Today's $260 max pain had about a$50M payout on a day of $2.4M in money flow. You find it a coincidence that the max pain this morning at open was $260 for the day, and then it magically bounced up and down around that (clear hedging) from 1pm on? It can be confirmed on Monday as well, as the hedges are unloaded. It works on AMZN about 80% of time (Friday move to max pain, with Monday reversal). It doesn;t always work out, but it is in option writer's and holder's best interest to maximize their gain each week and Q .. if they have the money to move the stock, why not. Until AMZN has a higher daily volume % (right now it is only 0.7% of outstanding - very low) - it can be moved with ease by big money (especially on Fri where overall volume is lowest of the week).

Message.Msg: Works until it doesn't. The TBTF banks (aka MM) have used POMO as infinite leverage to further extend the imbalances within the market and knockout real investors rather than to let the air out of the balloons (kill GLD and AAPL, pump NFLX, LNKD, SCAMAZON). They "won" short term, but will have truly killed the cult of equities in the process. Trust will never return from this next cycle. People will invest only in physical assets or in private/local/ILLIQUID assets not subject to WS corruption and HFT manipulation (HFT cannot steal from those holding "illiquid" assets and folks will find that there is no liquidity in the market when HFT sucks it all out just as it is needed...).. The banksters will find that society has no need for most of them. Even those that still have a position of power/wealth will find themselves targets from all parties WTSHTF (gov to recapture the ill gotten gains, those from whom they've effectively stolen, etc...).
